title: High noon skins
body:

replies.body:

YEAH MAN, YAUSO IS MY KIND OF CHAMPION, OP MAN!!!
Good, seems fair enough to be made, probably not the high noon thresh though, because thresh is more deathly than likely to sit down and have some tea during afternoon. xD
